name.baseName: Brick production ; concrete pavement brick ; Cutting process
砖生产 ; 混凝土路面砖 ; 切割工艺

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This dataset pertains to the production of concrete pavement bricks used for construction of pedestrian sidewalks, public squares, driveways, and other similar applications where concrete paving is applicable. The production involves a cutting process that enables the manufacturing of pavement bricks with precise dimensions. This specific data set can be utilized by manufacturers and researchers involved in the design and construction of urban infrastructure to improve production methods and environmental sustainability.
该数据集涉及用于建筑人行道、公共广场、私家车道以及其他需要混凝土铺设的应用的混凝土路面砖的生产。生产包括一个切割工艺，使得可以精确尺寸制造路面砖。该特定数据集可被生产商和研究人员利用，参与城市基础设施的设计和建造，以改进生产方法和提高环境可持续性。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The functional unit is the area of 1 m2 brick products.

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset pertains to the production of concrete pavement bricks used for construction of pedestrian sidewalks, public squares, driveways, and other similar applications where concrete paving is applicable. The production involves a cutting process that enables the manufacturing of pavement bricks with precise dimensions. This specific data set can be utilized by manufacturers and researchers involved in the design and construction of urban infrastructure to improve production methods and environmental sustainability.
该数据集涉及用于建筑人行道、公共广场、私家车道以及其他需要混凝土铺设的应用的混凝土路面砖的生产。生产包括一个切割工艺，使得可以精确尺寸制造路面砖。该特定数据集可被生产商和研究人员利用，参与城市基础设施的设计和建造，以改进生产方法和提高环境可持续性。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: ReCiPe midpoint (H) model is applied in this study.
本研究采用了 ReCiPe midpoint（H）模型。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: 本研究从济南顺德水泥制品有限公司收集了混凝土路面砖和透水砖的生产能耗以及各种原材料、能源投入和废气排放的相关数据。济南顺德水泥制品有限公司 山东省。

In this study, the production energy consumption of concrete pavement brick and permeable brick as well as the relevant data of all kinds of raw materials and energy input and exhaust emissions are collected from Jinan Shunde Cement Products Co. Ltd. Shandong Province.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Yuan, X. et al. Environmental and economic impacts assessment of concrete pavement brick and permeable brick production process - A case study in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 171, 198–208 (2018).

Yuan, X. et al. Environmental and economic impacts assessment of concrete pavement brick and permeable brick production process - A case study in China. Journal of Cleaner Production 171, 198–208 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.samplingProcedure: Most data of raw materials, energy input and waste discharge were collected from the site investigation of manufacturer. Water reducer is also called water reducing agent, whose chemical constituents is the sodium salt of the sulfonate formaldehyde condensation
原材料、能源投入和废物排放的大部分数据都是从生产厂家的现场调查中收集的。减水剂，其化学成分是磺酸钠盐的甲醛缩合物
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this dataset should note the precision of the functional unit in representing the production energy and materials input per square meter of brick product. It is advisable to conduct individualized assessments considering local production characteristics when applying this dataset for comparison or improvement purposes. Sensitivity analysis based on a 5% variation in inputs and outputs should be factored in when assessing the reliability of the data for different key processes. Additionally, one should include considerations of regional environmental impacts and manufacturer-specific practices when utilizing this data in Life Cycle Assessments.
使用该数据集的用户应注意功能单位表示每平方米砖产品的生产能耗和材料投入的精度。建议在使用该数据集进行比较或改进目的时，考虑当地生产特性进行个性化评估。在评估不同关键工序的数据可靠性时，应考虑基于输入和输出5%变化的敏感性分析。另外，当在生命周期评价中使用这些数据时，还应包括对区域环境影响和制造商特定实践的考虑。

completeness.common:other: In this research, the sensitivity analysis was carried out according to the principle of 5% variation for input and output in the change of key processes.
在本研究中，根据关键工序变化中输入和输出变化 5%的原则进行了敏感性分析。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
